Jorge Lorenzo Terpuruk, Cal Crutchlow Peringatkan Honda
06 Nov 2019, 15:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Pebalap LCR Honda Castrol, Cal Crutchlow, mengaku tak kaget melihat keterpurukan rider Repsol Honda, Jorge Lorenzo, di MotoGP musim ini. Ia bahkan telah memperingatkan Honda sejak lama bahwa hal macam ini akan terjadi pada salah satu rider mereka, selama mereka tak mau mengubah karakter RC213V.
Crutchlow telah membela LCR Honda sejak 2015, dan termasuk salah satu rider yang turut andil dalam pengembangan RCV. Sayangnya, akibat cedera engkel yang parah akhir tahun lalu, ia tak terlibat dalam proses pengembangan RCV 2019. Tahu-tahu, motor tersebut punya tenaga mesin yang jauh lebih besar.
RCV versi terdahulu pun sudah dikenal sangat agresif, meski lebih lincah di tikungan. Kali ini, dengan tenaga mesin yang lebih masif, RCV justru semakin agresif, dan kelincahannya di tikungan menghilang. Crutchlow sendiri merasa tak nyaman, namun masalah ini ternyata berdampak lebih besar pada Lorenzo.
text:
Jorge Lorenzo Slumped, Cal Crutchlow Warns Honda
Nov 6 2019, 15:25 by Bola.net
LONDON - Honda Crrol LCR rider Cal Crutchlow said he was not surprised at the deterioration of Repsol Honda rider Jorge Lorenzo in MotoGP this season. He had even warned Honda for a long time that something like this would happen to one of their riders, as long as they did not want to change the character of RC213V.
Crutchlow has been defending the Honda LCR since 2015, and is one of the riders who contributed to the development of RCV. Unfortunately, due to a severe ankle injury late last year, he was not involved in the process of developing the 2019 RCV. Next thing I know, the motorbike has far greater engine power.
The previous version of RCV was already known to be very aggressive, although it was more agile around the corner. This time, with more massive engine power, the RCV is even more aggressive, and its agility around the corner disappears. Crutchlow himself felt uncomfortable, but this problem turned out to have a greater impact on Lorenzo.
